title: We Die Alone: A WWII Epic of Escape and Endurance
description: A World War II chronicles of Jan Baalsrud's escape from Nazi-occupied arctic Norway.Â We Die Alone is an astonishing true story of heroism and endurance. Like Slavomir Rawicz's The Long Walk, it is also an unforgettable portrait of the determination of the human spirit.
author: David Howarth
